api.title: SimpleCursorTreeAdapter
api.api-signature: public abstract class SimpleCursorTreeAdapter extends ResourceCursorTreeAdapter

method.name: newChildView(Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isLastChild, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Makes a new child view to hold the data pointed to by cursor.

method.name: newGroupView(Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isExpanded, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Makes a new group view to hold the group data pointed to by cursor.

method.name: bindChildView(View view, Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isLastChild)
method.description: Bind an existing view to the child data pointed to by cursor

method.name: bindGroupView(View view, Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isExpanded)
method.description: Bind an existing view to the group data pointed to by cursor.

method.name: getChildView(int groupPosition, int childPosition, boolean isLastChild, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
getChildrenCursor(Cursor groupCursor)
method.description: Gets the Cursor for the children at the given group.

method.name: getGroupView(int groupPosition, boolean isExpanded, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
newChildView(Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isLastChild, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Makes a new child view to hold the data pointed to by cursor.

method.name: newGroupView(Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isExpanded, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Makes a new group view to hold the group data pointed to by cursor.

method.name: notifyDataSetChanged(boolean releaseCursors)
method.description: Notifies a data set change, but with the option of not releasing any cached cursors.

method.name: onGroupCollapsed(int groupPosition)
method.description: Called when a group is collapsed.

method.name: setChildrenCursor(int groupPosition, Cursor childrenCursor)
method.description: Sets the children Cursor for a particular group.

method.name: setGroupCursor(Cursor cursor)
method.description: Sets the group Cursor.

method.name: getChildType(int groupPosition, int childPosition)
method.description: Get the type of child View that will be created by ExpandableListAdapter.getChildView(int, int, boolean, View, ViewGroup) for the specified child item.

method.name: getCombinedChildId(long groupId, long childId)
method.description: Override this method if you foresee a clash in IDs based on this scheme:

method.name: getCombinedGroupId(long groupId)
method.description: Override this method if you foresee a clash in IDs based on this scheme:

method.name: getGroupType(int groupPosition)
method.description: Get the type of group View that will be created by ExpandableListAdapter.getGroupView(int, boolean, View, ViewGroup) .

method.name: onGroupCollapsed(int groupPosition)
method.description: Called when a group is collapsed.

method.name: onGroupExpanded(int groupPosition)
method.description: Called when a group is expanded.

method.name: clone()
method.description: Creates and returns a copy of this object.

method.name: equals(Object obj)
method.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one.

method.name: finalize()
method.description: Called by the garbage collector on an object when garbage collection determines that there are no more references to the object.

method.name: getClass()
method.description: Returns the runtime class of this Object.

method.name: hashCode()
method.description: Returns a hash code value for the object.

method.name: notify()
method.description: Wakes up a single thread that is waiting on this object's monitor.

method.name: notifyAll()
method.description: Wakes up all threads that are waiting on this object's monitor.

method.name: toString()
method.description: Returns a string representation of the object.

method.name: wait(long millis, int nanos)
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object, or some other thread interrupts the current thread, or a certain amount of real time has elapsed.

method.name: wait(long millis)
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until either another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object, or a specified amount of time has elapsed.

method.name: wait()
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object.

method.name: getChild(int groupPosition, int childPosition)
method.description: Gets the data associated with the given child within the given group.

method.name: getChildId(int groupPosition, int childPosition)
method.description: Gets the ID for the given child within the given group.

method.name: getChildView(int groupPosition, int childPosition, boolean isLastChild, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Gets a View that displays the data for the given child within the given group.

method.name: getChildrenCount(int groupPosition)
method.description: Gets the number of children in a specified group.

method.name: getCombinedChildId(long groupId, long childId)
method.description: Gets an ID for a child that is unique across any item (either group or child) that is in this list.

method.name: getCombinedGroupId(long groupId)
method.description: Gets an ID for a group that is unique across any item (either group or child) that is in this list.

method.name: getGroup(int groupPosition)
method.description: Gets the data associated with the given group.

method.name: getGroupCount()
method.description: Gets the number of groups.

method.name: getGroupId(int groupPosition)
method.description: Gets the ID for the group at the given position.

method.name: getGroupView(int groupPosition, boolean isExpanded, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
method.description: Gets a View that displays the given group.

method.name: hasStableIds()
method.description: Indicates whether the child and group IDs are stable across changes to the underlying data.

method.name: isChildSelectable(int groupPosition, int childPosition)
method.description: Whether the child at the specified position is selectable.

method.name: onGroupCollapsed(int groupPosition)
method.description: Called when a group is collapsed.

method.name: onGroupExpanded(int groupPosition)
method.description: Called when a group is expanded.

method.name: getChildType(int groupPosition, int childPosition)
method.description: Get the type of child View that will be created by ExpandableListAdapter.getChildView(int, int, boolean, View, ViewGroup) for the specified child item.

method.name: getGroupType(int groupPosition)
method.description: Get the type of group View that will be created by ExpandableListAdapter.getGroupView(int, boolean, View, ViewGroup) .

method.name: SimpleCursorTreeAdapter(Context context, Cursor cursor, int collapsedGroupLayout, int expandedGroupLayout, String[] groupFrom, int[] groupTo, int childLayout, int lastChildLayout, String[] childFrom, int[] childTo)
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: SimpleCursorTreeAdapter(Context context, Cursor cursor, int collapsedGroupLayout, int expandedGroupLayout, String[] groupFrom, int[] groupTo, int childLayout, String[] childFrom, int[] childTo)
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: SimpleCursorTreeAdapter(Context context, Cursor cursor, int groupLayout, String[] groupFrom, int[] groupTo, int childLayout, String[] childFrom, int[] childTo)
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: getViewBinder()
method.description: Returns the SimpleCursorTreeAdapter.ViewBinder used to bind data to views.

method.name: setViewBinder(SimpleCursorTreeAdapter.ViewBinder viewBinder)
method.description: Sets the binder used to bind data to views.

method.name: setViewText(TextView v, String text)
method.description: Called by bindView() to set the text for a TextView but only if there is no existing ViewBinder or if the existing ViewBinder cannot handle binding to a TextView.

api.name: SimpleCursorTreeAdapter
api.api_signature: public SimpleCursorTreeAdapter (Context context, Cursor cursor, int collapsedGroupLayout, int expandedGroupLayout, String[] groupFrom, int[] groupTo, int childLayout, int lastChildLayout, String[] childFrom, int[] childTo)

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: The context where the ExpandableListView associated with this SimpleCursorTreeAdapter is running

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Cursor: The database cursor

parameter.name: collapsedGroupLayout
parameter.description: int: The resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for a collapsed group. The layout file should include at least those named views defined in groupTo.

parameter.name: expandedGroupLayout
parameter.description: int: The resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for an expanded group. The layout file should include at least those named views defined in groupTo.

parameter.name: groupFrom
parameter.description: String: A list of column names that will be used to display the data for a group.

parameter.name: groupTo
parameter.description: int: The group views (from the group layouts) that should display column in the "from" parameter. These should all be TextViews or ImageViews. The first N views in this list are given the values of the first N columns in the from parameter.

parameter.name: childLayout
parameter.description: int: The resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for a child (except the last). The layout file should include at least those named views defined in childTo.

parameter.name: lastChildLayout
parameter.description: int: The resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for the last child within a group. The layout file should include at least those named views defined in childTo.

parameter.name: childFrom
parameter.description: String: A list of column names that will be used to display the data for a child.

parameter.name: childTo
parameter.description: int: The child views (from the child layouts) that should display column in the "from" parameter. These should all be TextViews or ImageViews. The first N views in this list are given the values of the first N columns in the from parameter.

api.name: SimpleCursorTreeAdapter
api.api_signature: public SimpleCursorTreeAdapter (Context context, Cursor cursor, int collapsedGroupLayout, int expandedGroupLayout, String[] groupFrom, int[] groupTo, int childLayout, String[] childFrom, int[] childTo)

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: The context where the ExpandableListView associated with this SimpleCursorTreeAdapter is running

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Cursor: The database cursor

parameter.name: collapsedGroupLayout
parameter.description: int: The resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for a collapsed group. The layout file should include at least those named views defined in groupTo.

parameter.name: expandedGroupLayout
parameter.description: int: The resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for an expanded group. The layout file should include at least those named views defined in groupTo.

parameter.name: groupFrom
parameter.description: String: A list of column names that will be used to display the data for a group.

parameter.name: groupTo
parameter.description: int: The group views (from the group layouts) that should display column in the "from" parameter. These should all be TextViews or ImageViews. The first N views in this list are given the values of the first N columns in the from parameter.

parameter.name: childLayout
parameter.description: int: The resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for a child. The layout file should include at least those named views defined in childTo.

parameter.name: childFrom
parameter.description: String: A list of column names that will be used to display the data for a child.

parameter.name: childTo
parameter.description: int: The child views (from the child layouts) that should display column in the "from" parameter. These should all be TextViews or ImageViews. The first N views in this list are given the values of the first N columns in the from parameter.

api.name: SimpleCursorTreeAdapter
api.api_signature: public SimpleCursorTreeAdapter (Context context, Cursor cursor, int groupLayout, String[] groupFrom, int[] groupTo, int childLayout, String[] childFrom, int[] childTo)

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: The context where the ExpandableListView associated with this SimpleCursorTreeAdapter is running

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Cursor: The database cursor

parameter.name: groupLayout
parameter.description: int: The resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for a group. The layout file should include at least those named views defined in groupTo.

parameter.name: groupFrom
parameter.description: String: A list of column names that will be used to display the data for a group.

parameter.name: groupTo
parameter.description: int: The group views (from the group layouts) that should display column in the "from" parameter. These should all be TextViews or ImageViews. The first N views in this list are given the values of the first N columns in the from parameter.

parameter.name: childLayout
parameter.description: int: The resource identifier of a layout file that defines the views for a child. The layout file should include at least those named views defined in childTo.

parameter.name: childFrom
parameter.description: String: A list of column names that will be used to display the data for a child.

parameter.name: childTo
parameter.description: int: The child views (from the child layouts) that should display column in the "from" parameter. These should all be TextViews or ImageViews. The first N views in this list are given the values of the first N columns in the from parameter.

api.name: getViewBinder
api.description: Returns the SimpleCursorTreeAdapter.ViewBinder used to bind data to views.

parameter.name: SimpleCursorTreeAdapter.ViewBinder
parameter.description: a ViewBinder or null if the binder does not exist

api.name: setViewBinder
api.description: Sets the binder used to bind data to views.

parameter.name: viewBinder
parameter.description: SimpleCursorTreeAdapter.ViewBinder: the binder used to bind data to views, can be null to remove the existing binder

api.name: setViewText
api.api_signature: public void setViewText (TextView v, String text)
api.description: Called by bindView() to set the text for a TextView but only if there is no existing ViewBinder or if the existing ViewBinder cannot handle binding to a TextView. Intended to be overridden by Adapters that need to filter strings retrieved from the database.

parameter.name: v
parameter.description: TextView: TextView to receive text

parameter.name: text
parameter.description: String: the text to be set for the TextView

api.name: bindChildView
api.api_signature: protected void bindChildView (View view, Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isLastChild)
api.description: Bind an existing view to the child data pointed to by cursor

parameter.name: view
parameter.description: View: Existing view, returned earlier by newChildView

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: Interface to application's global information

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Cursor: The cursor from which to get the data. The cursor is already moved to the correct position.

parameter.name: isLastChild
parameter.description: boolean: Whether the child is the last child within its group.

api.name: bindGroupView
api.api_signature: protected void bindGroupView (View view, Context context, Cursor cursor, boolean isExpanded)
api.description: Bind an existing view to the group data pointed to by cursor.

parameter.name: view
parameter.description: View: Existing view, returned earlier by newGroupView.

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: Interface to application's global information

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Cursor: The cursor from which to get the data. The cursor is already moved to the correct position.

parameter.name: isExpanded
parameter.description: boolean: Whether the group is expanded.

api.name: setViewImage
api.api_signature: protected void setViewImage (ImageView v, String value)
api.description: Called by bindView() to set the image for an ImageView. By default, the value will be treated as a Uri. Intended to be overridden by Adapters that need to filter strings retrieved from the database.

parameter.name: v
parameter.description: ImageView: ImageView to receive an image

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: String: the value retrieved from the cursor
